cards.description: Gain 7 block. Gain 2 Dexterity. At the start of the next turn, lose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Beaten Up
cards.description: Gain 3 Dexterity. At the start of the next turn, lose 3 Dexterity. During enemy's turn, deal damage by Dexterity amount to the enemy attacked you.

cards.name: Beaten Up+
cards.description: Gain 4 Dexterity. At the start of the next turn, lose 4 Dexterity. During enemy's turn, deal damage by Dexterity amount to the enemy attacked you.

cards.name: Wolf Pack+

relics.name: Sanity
relics.description: Return half of SP you consumed first during each turn. (Maximum 5)
relics.flavorText: "Doctor, it's not to eat!"

relics.name: Ability Aura
relics.description: At the start of turn, Gain 2 SP.
relics.flavorText: "ERA HASSEI-"

relics.name: Berate
relics.description: When you play 4 attack card, gain 2 SP.
relics.flavorText: "Chen doesn't use this stuff."

relics.name: Hidden Killer
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain 2 Strength for next turn.
relics.flavorText: Why don't you reach out your hand to her?

relics.name: Rhine Circuitry
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards, gain 2 SP.
relics.flavorText: "Do not pass or read the manual to Ifrit."

relics.name: Spiritual Recovery
relics.description: Gain 1 SP when healed.
relics.flavorText: It contains a small amount of mustard extract...

relics.name: Bonebreaker
relics.description: Every attacks will have 2 minimum damage.
relics.flavorText: She's Walking on the wall as if it's obvious.

relics.name: Industrial Water Cannon
relics.description: When you consume SP 3 times, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: "Chief... Theytheythey're barbecuinginthedormagain. Canyouplease stopthemforme! Aaaah! Someoneswapped myfireextinguisher withIfrit'sflamethrower! Areyouokay, Chief?"

relics.name: Lavender
relics.description: At the end of turn, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Perfumer's botanical garden always smells like lavender.

relics.name: Military Tradition
relics.description: At the start of battle, gain 8 SP.
relics.flavorText: I guess Victoria should wear traditional clothing.

relics.name: "Gyao" Ring
relics.description: Gain 15 additional gold when you obtain gold.
relics.flavorText: It is the second most popular item after a photo of someone who is praised as a god of money.

relics.name: Emergency Defibrillator
relics.description: When attacked damage reduces your health to less than 25%, attacked damage reduced to 0 for this turn and heal 50% HP at the start of the next turn. (works once)
relics.flavorText: Do not act violently while the defibrillator is in operation.

relics.name: Remnant Ash
relics.description: When you gain critical damage, your HP will not fall below 1, but you will die after 2 turns. (works once)
relics.flavorText: Lævateinn!

relics.name: Originium Addiction
relics.description: Maximum SP increased by 10.
relics.flavorText: Closer is said to be looking for the missing pure Orginium.

relics.name: Omniscience
relics.description: Prevent 2 times you would lose HP each combat.
relics.flavorText: CAUTION: Very hot

relics.name: Sanity+
relics.description:
Replaces Sanity. Return half of SP you consumed first during each turn.
Maximum SP Limit increased by 10.
relics.flavorText: "Doctor, don't take it secretly and eat it!"

relics.name: Tactical Delivery
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Maximum SP Limit decreased by 20.
relics.flavorText: It smells like seafood bibim sauce.

relics.name: Arts
relics.description: When you play Caster card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: There must be something to do with it.

relics.name: Assault
relics.description: When you play Vanguard card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: "BIBITTENJYANE-!"

relics.name: Attack
relics.description: When you play Guard card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: Attack is the best defense.

relics.name: Cure
relics.description: When you play Medic card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: "Come here, please."

relics.name: Defend
relics.description: When you play Defender card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: Defense is the best attack.

relics.name: Snipe
relics.description: When you play Sniper card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: It's better to get rid of the hazard in advance.

relics.name: Special
relics.description: When you play Specialist card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: Whenever a specialist team gets together, they say they can't see two people.

relics.name: Support
relics.description: When you play Supporter card, gain 1 SP.
relics.flavorText: "Mr. Blood, that's a waiting room for supporters."

keywords.name: Auto
keywords.description: Consume automatically if you have enough SP.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: At the start and the end of turn, lose HP.

keywords.name: Manual
keywords.description: You can consume by Mode Change Button if you have enough SP.

keywords.name: Order
keywords.description: At the start of turn, gain 1 energy.

keywords.name: SP
keywords.description: Use enhanced effect when you consume SP.
